chapter.title: Getting your &scc; Mirror Credentials
chapter.para:
Start a Web browser and navigate to . On the &scc; (SCC) login page, log in to view your mirror credentials and see all entitlements for your registered systems. If you have not yet registered a system or do not have a &suse; account, create a new account by following the Create an account link. After creating a new user account, you must register a system before using &susemgr;. On the &scc; Web page, activate the Organization tab to get your mirroring credentials needed to access the channels for your &suse; products.
For information about SCC, refer to the SCC help available at .
